tropico 4 is a fun city builder with cultural flare  the deep campaign mode has some unique challenges and the game lends itself to varied styles of play  historical leaders each offer unique bonuses to encourage replay with strategies built around specific strengths and weaknesses  tropico 4 is often considered the best of the tropico game series and the gameplay design still holds up in spite of dated visuals
